sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
    <Navbar :category="category" />
    <Carousel :category="category"/>
    <router-view :categories="category"></router-view>
    {{ category }}
    <!-- <Footer/> -->
  </section>
</template>

    <script>
    import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';
    // import Footer from './components/Footer.vue';
    import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
    import Carousel from './components/Carousel.vue';
    export default {
      data() {
        return {
          category:[
            {
        id: 1,
        name: 'Genç Odaları',
        slug: 'genc-odalari',
        path: '/category/genc-odalari',
        images: [
          'https://www.ritmikgencodasi.com.tr/idea/mh/64/myassets/products/781/2.jpg?revision=1757504615',
          'https://www.sandalie.com/idea/dm/23/myassets/products/292/retro-genc-odasi-takimi-2.jpg?revision=1746614150'
        ],
      },
      {
        id: 2,
        name: 'Bebek Odaları',
        slug: 'bebek-odalari',
        path: '/category/bebek-odalari',
        images: [
          'https://ideacdn.net/idea/mh/63/myassets/products/078/bella-2_min.jpg?revision=1757931477',
          'https://www.palmera.com.tr/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/lorena-bebek-odasi-3.jpg'
        ],
      }
          ]
        }
      },
      components:{
        Navbar,Carousel
      },
      methods: {
      },
      async mounted() {
      try {
        const res = await fetch("/db.json"); // await ekledik
        if (!res.ok) throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${res.status}`);
    
        const data = await res.json(); // await ekledik
        const slug = this.$route.params.slug;

        this.category = data.categories.find(c => c.slug === slug) || null;
        console.log(this.category);

      } catch(err) {
      console.error("Veri alınamadı", err);
      }
      }

    }
    </script>

<style>
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

#categoryCarousel{
  display: grid;
}
.hero-img {
  object-fit: cover;
  max-height: 700px;
  width: 100vw;
}
a {
  text-decoration: none;
  max-height: 100px;
  font-size: 18px;
}
i {
  font-size: 25px;
}

</style>
